overview:
Naresh is CEO of Bluebox Now! Bluebox Now! is a casual gaming network sponsored by brands that help loyalty marketers engage and retain their customers better. We help brands engage customers through casual games and retain them by matching the right games and rewards to appropriate demographics and increase the redemption of rewards.

Naresh was most recently a software architect at Pelago where he was responsible for recommendation, personalization, and social search. Naresh is a seasoned software engineer and architect. Prior to Pelago, Naresh spent over 8 years as a lead architect at Zones, Inc, a leading national network of company-owned logistics, integration and distribution facilities to support clients with immediate access to inventory, configuration and deployment services. Naresh earned his PGDCA in Computer Science, MS and BS in Honors Physics at Panjab University.
